name: Same Day Sourdough
instructions: Mix flour + water and leave for 30 to 60 minute autolyse
Knead dough for 10-15 minutes, until consistency noticeably changes
Stretch and fold dough, remove from container and shape on floured surface
Transfer shaped dough to banneton and let rise for another hour
Bake at 450 for 30 minutes lid on, followed by lid off until desired color
